Title: Clinton L. Jeffery
Body: in Computer Science (1989), University of Arizona Ph.D. in Computer Science (1993), University of Arizona Areas of Interest program execution monitoring , program visualization , programming languages, internet technologies , object-oriented programming, software engineering, programming environments Summary of Research Current research projects include the ALAMO execution monitoring environment , the Proxy Sharing Proxy Server project , and graphical and object-oriented extensions to the Icon programming language .
